thread.title: American Eagle Outfitters Invites You to Listen to Its First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: American Eagle Outfitters Invites You to Listen to Its First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call

organizations.name: http://investors.ae.com about american eagle outfitters, inc

text:
PITTSBURGH--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- In conjunction with American Eagle Outfitters' (NYSE: AEO) first quarter 2018 earnings release, you are invited to listen to a broadcast of the conference call live over the Internet on Thursday, May 31, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. ET.
What: American Eagle Outfitters First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call When: 9:00 a.m. ET, Thursday, May 31, 2018 Where: http://investors.ae.com How: Live over the Internet – Simply log on to the Internet at the address above, or call: Domestic Dial-In Number: (877) 407-0789
Domestic Replay Number: (844) 512-2921, conference ID number 13678171 International Dial-In Number: (201) 689-8562
International Replay Number: (412) 317-6671, conference ID number 13678171
The call will be archived and made available online at http://investors.ae.com
About American Eagle Outfitters, Inc.
American Eagle Outfitters, Inc. (NYSE: AEO) is a leading global specialty retailer offering high-quality, on-trend clothing, accessories and personal care products at affordable prices under its American Eagle Outfitters® and Aerie® brands. The company operates more than 1,000 stores in the United States, Canada, Mexico, China and Hong Kong, and ships to 81 countries worldwide through its websites. American Eagle Outfitters and Aerie merchandise also is available at more than 200 international locations operated by licensees in 25 countries. For more information, please visit www.ae.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180509005207/en/
American Eagle Outfitters
Olivia Messina, 412-432-3300
LineMedia@ae.com
Source: American Eagle Outfitters
